Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Removeable

All Superinterfaces:
GameNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Removeable
extends GameNode
A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an YaegerEntity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void notifyRemove()
    Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removeable should be removed.
    void remove()
    Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.GameNode

    getNode

  • Method Details

    • remove

      void remove()
      Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

    • notifyRemove

      default void notifyRemove()
      Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removeable should be removed.
